Urgent: tell your representatives to abolish capital punishment.
 ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌

End the death penalty in Louisiana

Tell your representatives to support House Bill 215.

ADD MY NAME

Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

The death penalty is a broken process from start to finish — and right now we have a historic chance to abolish it in Louisiana.

On Wednesday, the Louisiana House will consider House Bill 215, which would prospectively repeal the death penalty in our state.

Contact your representatives NOW and tell them to support House Bill 215 to end capital punishment in Louisiana.

Louisiana has had 11 death row exonerations, the 4th highest number of exonerations from death row of any state.

That’s why we need to take action now, before another innocent person is condemned to die for a crime they didn’t commit.

Racial disparities pervade every aspect of capital punishment in America. Studies show that the likelihood of being sentenced to death depends not on someone’s guilt or the severity of the crime — but on the color of their skin.

Tell members of the Louisiana House that if they truly believe in protecting human dignity, they should vote YES on House Bill 215.

ACLU of Louisiana
